Player History

Drafted in 1st round, 2nd overall pick, by St. Louis (C) in 2019...
Injured on 7/14/2019 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/21/2020 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for full season...
Earned first career win on 8/5/2021...
Was selected to the 2023 Allstar game...
Won World Series with St. Louis (C) in 2023...
Injured on 5/24/2024 with a Tender Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
1/31/2025: Gets a new one-year contract worth $871,429 through salary arbitration...
